overview: Four men succesfully robbed a bank but unfortunately one of their gang members was injured and had to be brought to the hospital. At the same time, a lady who cares for the elderly at an old folks home, brings one of its occupants to the same hospital for treatment. What unsues is the unravelling of a hidden agenda where no one suspects the least, while being pursued by a police investigator at the same time.
title: Pecah
